title: CSINTSY vs CSALGCM vs CCINFOM
body: I'm taking these subjects next term and I just want to know which subject has a lot of workload, requires more focus, etc.

title: can i really not pet the DLSU cats :(
body: whenever i eat lunch near bloemen, many cats approach me and they are all so very very cute. can i really not pet them? they're so CUTE!! i cannnot resist their meows!!!!!

title: Budget Tips pls!
body: i'll be staying in a condo near campus for the rest of my college life. pls share budget tips. i don't wanna be broke :(

title: Should I change my degree program?
body: Hi friends. I am currently a 3rd year Civil Engineering student. I'll just say it straight out. I'm not enjoying my course. Although I haven't failed anything yet, I just don't see myself doing this in the future. I'm not happy right now. In fact, this course bores me. It's really difficult, and whenever I get a good grade . . . I feel nothing. I feel that I would be much happier in a course I actually want to be in? How do I proceed with this? I'm afraid of disappointing my parents. Wasting 2 years of Civil Eng seems very . . . wrong. What should I do? Help me out.

title: Seeking Tips for Incoming Accountancy Student
body: Hey guys! My sister's an incoming accountancy student, and I just wanna know if any of you've got juicy advice or tips for this freshman right here (my sister!).
